Windlord/Condor::


Windlord screamed with pain and he quicly turned his body trying to 
punch Fury's face.


Condor avoided the fire and he shot against Riekan


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Riekan/Fury::
> 
> Riekan drops groundward and changes to hover-transport mode, 
smoothly 
> avoiding Condor's attack and returning with his harpoon cannon.
> 
> Meanwhile Fury triggers his cloaking device and vanishes, only to 
> reappear right behind Windlord, his lashknife seeking blood (or 
> whatever passes for blood with these guys).
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord/Condor::
> > 
> > 
> > Windlord dodges the fire and strike back against Rouges' squad. 
> > Condor joined him and he opened fire too
